reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
Planning Consent ref: P2022/2274/FUL - Installation of no.4 Air Source Heat Pumps (ASHPs) on the flat roof of Bevin Court, with associated water tanks, electrical panel and pipework, to replace the existing gas boilers. Installation of new electrical transformer and housing to the rear of the building. 

Listed Building Consent ref: P2022/2563/LBC, for the same works.
description:
Minor works to plant room elevation and new plant; pipework and conduits to rear elevation to connect roof plant with plant room; new photovoltaic panels to flat roof.
